p: Differential scanning calorimeter (DSC) is conducted in a Netzch STA 449 F3 Jupiter equipped with a TASC414/4 controller. The instrument is calibrated from a standard list. The sample of the powder ( x = 0.15) is loaded into an open alumina crucible. The measurement is performed between ~300 K to ~820 K with a heating rate of 5 K min −1 in Ar atmosphere.
